title: file explorer can't see any files that exist in Android/data sub directories
content:
I use a program called Osmand which is a GPS based program which saves tracks to one of its directories I need to be able to attach those files to email and send to others however I cannot see those directories anymore I have just updated to Android 11  today
I have gone into settings of the app how do you say to allow access but does not work
on a side note I used to be able to plug my phone in to my laptop via USB cable and browse files this also does not work anymore
